payload.content: Nemotron RAG allows users to build a multimodal intelligent document processing pipeline from scratch in under an hour using GPU-accelerated extraction and a few hundred lines of Python code to convert unstructured files into queryable knowledge.

name: Nemotron RAG allows users to build a multimodal intelligent document processing
content: Nemotron RAG allows users to build a multimodal intelligent document processing pipeline from scratch in under an hour using GPU-accelerated extraction and a few hundred lines of Python code to convert unstructured files into queryable knowledge.

payload.content: To build an intelligent document processing agent with Nemotron RAG, one can plug the NeMo Retriever library and Nemotron RAG models to structure text, tables (as markdown), and chart crops for high-recall multimodal retrieval.

name: To build an intelligent document processing agent with Nemotron RAG, one can plu
content: To build an intelligent document processing agent with Nemotron RAG, one can plug the NeMo Retriever library and Nemotron RAG models to structure text, tables (as markdown), and chart crops for high-recall multimodal retrieval.

payload.content: To ensure Nemotron RAG reliably surfaces relevant information for complex queries, users should tune chunking, embeddings, and reranking parameters.

name: To ensure Nemotron RAG reliably surfaces relevant information for complex querie
content: To ensure Nemotron RAG reliably surfaces relevant information for complex queries, users should tune chunking, embeddings, and reranking parameters.

payload.content: Top results from Nemotron RAG can be wired into a Nemotron-powered assistant to return grounded, traceable answers with citations to the exact page, table, or figure.

content: Top results from Nemotron RAG can be wired into a Nemotron-powered assistant to return grounded, traceable answers with citations to the exact page, table, or figure.
